participant_1.background:
I love to spend time with my cat, especially when I'm feeling stressed from school.
I take comfort in the thought that my blog is a place where I can be myself.
I'm secretly worried that my grocery store won't be successful.
On the weekend, I enjoy relaxing in my recliner after a long week of work.
I have a MacBook Pro, which is a great computer for me because it is powerful and portable.

participant_2.background:
I train to stay in peak physical condition for my job.
I was a computer programmer before I started my own business.
I cannot be a florist because I would not be able to see the colors of the flowers.
I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine.
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.

content.text: Hi!
Hey, what's up?
Not much, just trying to relax after a long day at work.
I can relate. I just got back from the gym. I love to stay in peak physical condition for my job.
That's awesome! I used to be into working out, but I haven't been to the gym in a while.
You should go back! It's a great way to relieve stress.
Yeah, I know. I've been thinking about going back.
It's always a good idea to stay in shape. Plus, it's a great way to meet new people.
That's true. I could use some new friends.
Well, if you ever decide to go back to the gym, let me know. I'd be happy to go with you.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
No problem! What do you do for work?
I'm a grocery store owner.
Oh, cool! I used to be a computer programmer, but I started my own business a few years ago.
That's awesome! What kind of business did you start?
I started a web design company.
Oh, that's really cool! How's it going?
It's going great! I'm really happy with it.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my cat, write in my blog, and relax in my recliner.
That sounds really relaxing. I love to spend time with my family, take my son to the zoo, and go swimming.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I had more time to spend with my family.
You should make time! It's important to spend time with the people you love.
You're right. I'll try to make more time for them.
Good! I'm sure they'd appreciate it.
Thanks for the advice!
No problem
